SEARCH
Package it.polimi.GC13.model

Class PlayableCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.GC13.model.PlayableCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
StartCard
public class PlayableCard extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a playable card in the game. Each card has a serial number, reign, type, resources on the edges, resources needed to play, points given under certain conditions, and specific points condition.
See Also:

    • PlayableCard

      public PlayableCard(int serialNumber, Resource reign, CardType cardType, Resource[] edgeFrontResource, Map<Resource,Integer> resourceNeeded, int pointsGiven, PointsCondition condition)
      Constructs a new PlayableCard with the given attributes.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number of the card.
      reign - The reign resource associated with the card.
      cardType - The type of the card.
      edgeFrontResource - The resources on the edges of the card.
      resourceNeeded - The resources needed to play the card and their quantities.
      pointsGiven - The points given by the card.
      condition - The condition under which points are given.

  • Method Details

    • getPointsGiven

      public int getPointsGiven(Board board, int X, int Y)
      Calculates the points given after the card is placed on the board based on the specified condition.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board where the card is placed.
      X - The X coordinate of the card placement.
      Y - The Y coordinate of the card placement.
      Returns:
      The points given based on the condition.

      public void linePrinter(int version, int line, boolean isFlipped)
